quest.name: A Purchase of Fruit
journal: Tesleen has the air of a woman being pulled in ten directions at once.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: This is what I get for sharing! Maybe I'll just head out on another patrol...

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: I'd love to lay out a welcome meal, but the duties I put off when I went to the market are still waiting for me...

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Argh! There are a hundred and one things that need doing! I'm sorry, but would you mind waiting here with Alisaie?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What, and twiddle our thumbs while you work yourself to death? Surely there's something we can help you with?

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: ...I could do with a hand, it's true. Thank you. You can start by helping me sort out the larder, Alisaie.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: While we do that, could you tend to a few patients, perhaps? There are three in particular I meant to visit─it's just a matter of saying a few words to them, and seeing that their skin isn't caked in sand.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Their names are Pawnil, Todden, and Halric. They may not give much in the way of a response, but I promise they'll be pleased to meet someone new!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I would speak more on the subject of sin eaters, but let's see these tasks finished first.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: It will do them good to see a new face. There's not much in the way of novelty around here to distract them from their worries.

dialogue.name: PAWNIL
dialogue.text: Th-Thank...you...

dialogue.name: PAWNIL
dialogue.text: Y-You're Alisaie's...friend? That's...good...

dialogue.name: TODDEN
dialogue.text: Todden glances up at you blankly, but you notice the tension in his face ease slightly.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Halric remains utterly still as you wipe the sand from his cheek.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The texture of his skin has hardened into something akin to plaster...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Your work is done, then?

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: You've seen to the patients? How were they?

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: ...Good. That's good. I knew they would enjoy meeting you.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: I am concerned about Halric, though... I'll have to speak with the other carers, but I think his time may be near.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We shall leave you to have that discussion, then. I was going to take Forename to Mord Souq if you have any errands there that need doing...?

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Well, I suppose there is one thing...

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Would you pick up a nectarine from the markets, please? Cassard's caravan just passed through, so Rhon Ron should have some fresh fruit.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Come, then, Forename─there's something I want you to see. Right after we stop at Rhon Ron's stall, of course.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Hm? Oh, my jobs are all under control now, thank you. Go and spend some time with Alisaie.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Let's see about that nectarine, shall we?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Oho, back again, are you? You need another taste of Rhon Ron's wares?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Actually, we're looking to buy a nectarine. Do you have any in stock?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Oh, yes! Nectarines, peaches, grapes! Fresh and juicy!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Hm... Given how richly you cracked your coinpurse with me, I might still owe you food... Here, take this one! Free of charge!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Gods, I've never seen a Mord merchant give away something for nothing before. How much coin did you spend here...?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Oh yes, I'll take a jar of honeyed worms as well.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hm? Oh no! They're not for me! It's...an offering of sorts.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Ahem, the worms, if you please?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Only the best wrigglers for you! Come again, my friends!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Right, that's our shopping chores taken care of. Let's head up past the aetheryte to the main tower─the view I want to show you can only be seen from its very top.

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: See you again soon! Your belly won't let you stay away!

dialogue.name: MORDGUARD
dialogue.text: <yawn> You need something?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Here are your precious worms. That buys us a trip to the top of the tower, does it not?

dialogue.name: MORDGUARD
dialogue.text: <gasp> Glazed Wrigglers! You actually brought them!

dialogue.name: MORDGUARD
dialogue.text: I really shouldn't let you, but...just this once, all right? Only once!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Never fails. Shall we?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm glad I was able to show you that. When it comes to understanding the catastrophe which befell the First, one glimpse of the empty wasteland beyond the wall is worth more than an hour of Urianger's lecturing.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And I needed you to know beyond a doubt that Tesleen has no other choice. The nectarine will be a kindness.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It isn't just the threat posed to others... When a person becomes an eater, the pain appears to be excruciating.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The carers are truly fond of their wards, and would spare them that suffering. It is their way of fighting back against a fate worse than death.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Go ahead. I think she's been waiting for us.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: You're back. I hope you had a nice time. Did you...manage to find a nectarine?

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Thank you. Alisaie's explained why I wanted this, has she? I can see it in your eyes.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: But we may not need it just yet. I spoke with the others, and we've decided to keep an eye on Halric for now.

dialogue.name: TESLEEN
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, though, if his time does come suddenly, we'll be ready to send him on his way with a taste of happier days...
